attributes.action: Not make Greenwich Police Stations work 10 days on, 4 days off
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This was does with no consultation, many parents won't see their kids at the weekends. No-one wants an unhappy police force. Make them put their hands in our pockets and get more police to work at weekends. This could result in many many experienced policeman leaving Greenwich, a borough of high crime.
